column1: Smoque BBQ////I went here based on them being on Triple D. They did not disappoint! The process is pretty different than other restaurants
column2: well at least in LA. First
column3: order and pay at the counter
column4: next a waiter has a table ready for your party. It was pretty crowded
column6: I didn't wait at all for a table. The food was only a few minutes.
